import { render } from "react-dom"; function App(){ let vitaminA=false; let vitamins = new Array(13).fill(false); this.buttonClicked = this.buttonClicked.bind(this); function buttonClicked(id){ vitamins[arguments[0]] = !vitamins[arguments[0]]; const vit = document.getElementById(arguments[0]); if(vitamins[arguments[0]]){ vit.style.background = 'red'; } else{ vit.style.background='gray'; } } return(
